FOV, Range, Accuracy, Frame rate, Resolution, Color perception, Size, Weather aff., Maintenance, Visibility, Price
```{r}
N <- 11
ranks <- c(2, 1, 1, 3, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 6, 3)
x_k <- c(90, 100, 100, 80, 80, 90, 50, 80, 40, 10, 75)
x_l <- 10
x_h <- 100
```

Next, we calculate y_k for each attribute

```{r}
y_k <- rep(0, N)
for (index in 1:N) {
  y_k[index] <- (x_k[index] - x_l)/(x_h - x_l)
}
```
Now, we calculate the pair-wise differences

```{r}

D <- matrix(rep(0,11*11), nrow = 11, byrow = TRUE)
for (row in 1:N) {
  for (col in 1:N) {
    D[row,col] <- (N-1)*(y_k[row] - y_k[col])  
  }
}
print(D)
```

We continue we the lower bound equation f_L

```{r}
h <- (x_h - x_l)/x_h
f_L <- matrix(rep(0,11*11), nrow = 11, byrow = TRUE)
for (row in 1:N) {
  for (col in 1:N) {
    f_L[row,col] <- (h*(D[row,col] -1))/((N-2)*(2+abs((ranks[row]-ranks[col]))))    
  }
}
print(f_L)
```

Next we continue with the upperbound equation f_U

```{r}
f_U <- matrix(rep(0,11*11), nrow = 11, byrow = TRUE)
for (row in 1:N) {
  for (col in 1:N) {
    f_U[row,col] <- min(((h/(2+abs((ranks[row]-ranks[col]))))+f_L[row,col]), 1)
  }
}
print(f_U)
```

Next we create all TYPE 1 contraints

```{r}
TYPE1 <- matrix(rep(0,11*11), nrow = 11, byrow = TRUE)
for (row in 1:N) {
  for (col in 1:N) {
    if (ranks[row] < ranks[col]) {
      TYPE1[row,col] <- f_L[row,col]
    }
  }
}
print(TYPE1)
```

Next we keep all TYPE 2 constraints

```{r}
TYPE2 <- matrix(rep(0,11*11), nrow = 11, byrow = TRUE)
for (row in 1:N) {
  for (col in 1:N) {
    if (ranks[row] < ranks[col]) {
      TYPE2[row,col] <- f_U[row,col]
    }
  }
}
print(TYPE2)
```
